## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c161ba3569bb42a4df0893e7bcb73dff9fc8371d01638f7fe27ecdf9011074f0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'requests-flask' @ 16.9.16 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
